title: Ranked Game Server Issues - Both Teams
body:
â€‹In this ranked game (North American server) on 2/25/2018 which ended approx 1:46pm PT, around mid game everyone started losing control of their champs. Then players on both sides were randomly dc'ing. Happened for the rest of the game. Began for me when I teleported to the bottom turret, initially it showed that the TP didn't work, then suddenly I was there at the turret but couldn't move Garen at all. Then for the next 20 mins or so, I had control of my champ for maybe a few mins. One of our team member was never able to reconnect. 

I talked to support as I felt neither team should have gained or lost LP because the severe issues were at Riot's end but was told there is nothing that can be done in regards to LP. If it were just me experiencing it, that's fine and I can accept the loss. Everyone on both teams was talking about it in All Chat and it wasn't a momentary problem, it lasted for around 20 minutes.  

The rep said they don't show any issues at Riot but there certainly was and that should be looked into.

replies.body: I had it too earlier if you check out my post.... I don't know what's happening. Upvoting this. (only it was on norms)
And the exact same thing just happened again in another ranked game. Constant dc's and loss of control for both teams.

Just got off a chat with another tech support rep who took all my logs and had me try a couple things. He verified the issue wasn't on my end but said they don't really know what it is at this point. He recommended not playing any more ranked games tonight until they figure this out. He had me start a custom game to see if any issues occurred and they did once the game had been going for a few mins. The same problem I had experienced before. Seems like it is across all modes. 

If you don't want to lose LP, be careful entering any new ranked games right now.
